main.java.indexer.server.daos

Class FieldDAO

  • java.lang.Object
    • main.java.indexer.server.daos.FieldDAO

  • public class FieldDAO
extends java.lang.Object

    Used to access the Field table in the database. Has all needed CRUD operations.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      FieldDAO() 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Field createField(Field field)
      Adds the given Field to the database
      void deleteField(Field field)
      Delete the given field from the database
      void deleteFieldsForRecord(Record record)
      Deletes all fields for the given record
      java.util.Map<Field,java.lang.String> readFieldsForRecord(Record record)
      Reads and returns all fields and their values for a given record from the database This function will access both the fields table and the recordvalues table
      Field updateField(Field field)
      Updates the given field in the database

    • Method Detail

      • createField

        public Field createField(Field field)
        Adds the given Field to the database
        Parameters:
        field - the field to be added to the database
        Returns:
        Null if unsuccessful, otherwise the field

      • readFieldsForRecord

        public java.util.Map<Field,java.lang.String> readFieldsForRecord(Record record)
        Reads and returns all fields and their values for a given record from the database This function will access both the fields table and the recordvalues table
        Parameters:
        record - the record to be used in the query
        Returns:
        A map of all fields and their values for the given record

      • updateField

        public Field updateField(Field field)
        Updates the given field in the database
        Parameters:
        field - the field to be updated
        Returns:
        The field that has been updated

      • deleteField

        public void deleteField(Field field)
        Delete the given field from the database
        Parameters:
        field - the field to be deleted

      • deleteFieldsForRecord

        public void deleteFieldsForRecord(Record record)
        Deletes all fields for the given record
        Parameters:
        record - The record which defines which batches to be deleted
